Package ACO

Class Ant

java.lang.Object
ACO.Ant
All Implemented Interfaces:
AntInterface
class Ant extends Object implements AntInterface
Class that represents one ant, connected to the ant colony through generalization

      private void removeLoop(int nodeToRemove)

      Parameters:
